special_text:
[i](As the condition is met for the first time each turn, add a deed counter. Stop when the deed is done.)[/i]
A Rogue or Bullet you control deals damage.
Destroy up to one target permanent if it was dealt damage this turn.
If a Rogue or Bullet you control would deal damage, it deals that much damage plus 1 instead. [i](Damage that finishes this deed isn’t increased.)[/i]
